title: Punishment for murder
content: Whoever commits murder shall be punished with death, or imprisonment for life, and shall also be liable to fine.

title: Rape
content: A man is said to commit 'rape' if he does certain acts under specific conditions without consent...

title: Cheating and dishonestly inducing delivery of property
content: Whoever cheats and thereby dishonestly induces the person deceived to deliver any property...
